text: Ticket #12847: Customer reports that the mobile app crashes when trying to upload photos. Issue started yesterday after the latest app update (version 2.3.1). User has iPhone 12 running iOS 16.4. Error occurs consistently when selecting photos from gallery. App works fine for text posts and comments. Customer has already tried restarting phone and reinstalling app with no success. Priority: High - affecting multiple users based on app store reviews.

analyzer.analysis: This content is a technical support issue report from a customer experiencing problems with the mobile app. The issue is specific to uploading photos, which suggests that there may be a bug or incompatibility issue with the latest app update (version 2.3.1) on iOS 16.4. The customer has already tried troubleshooting steps such as restarting their phone and reinstalling the app, but the problem persists. This report is marked as high priority due to its impact on multiple users based on App Store reviews.

summarizer.summary: A customer reported that the mobile app crashes when uploading photos, affecting multiple users after the latest update (version 2.3.1) on iOS 16.4, specifically on iPhone 12.
key_points: Incompatibility with latest app version (2.3.1) and iOS 16.4
summarizer.final_assessment: The content indicates a critical technical issue that requires immediate attention due to its impact on multiple users.
